questions.question_text: Select the field attribute that indicates whether this product result is from the most recent reconciliation run.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-service-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/task/add-custom-license-metric-samf.html

Reconciliation order - allocated Reconciliation metric rank priority for allocated licenses. Lower rank value takes precedence.

questions.question_text: In defining a Custom License Metric, in the Reconciliation Order field, the ___________ ‘metric rank priority’ number takes precedence.
The license metric attributes related list contains metric values set in software entitlements, and is used for reconciliation (metric group, license metric, and software model combination).

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-it-asset-management/page/product/software-asset-management2/concept/c_SAMLicenseMetrics.html

License metrics are set in software entitlements and are used for reconciliation (metric group, license metric, and software model combination).

Each metric group has a set of license metrics that are specific to the publisher.

You can view the Metric Attributes related list in software models to set the attribute value.

Selected Answer: A
software product result for a licensable product is generated after reconciliation even if there are no software models defined for the product.
A software model results record is only created when a software model or entitlement exists for the product.

questions.question_text: By default, when is a product result generated for a licensable product after reconciliation?

choices.D: Whenever there is at least one software model defined for the product
choices.A: Always, even if there are no software models defined for the product
choices.C: Only when there are software entitlements defined for the product
choices.E: Only when related entitlements have a cost identified
